00024 
00025 #ifndef _ROBOT_SERIALMANIPULATOR_
00026 #define _ROBOT_SERIALMANIPULATOR_
00027 
00028 #include <robot/robot>
00029 #include <robot/Manipulator>
00030 
00031 #include <base/array>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace robot {
00035 
00040 class SerialManipulator : public Manipulator
00041 {
00042 public:
00043 
00044   virtual Type type() const { return Serial; }
00045 
00046   // Parameters for a single joint
00047   struct JointParameters {
00048     enum JointType { Prismatic, Revolute };
00049 
00050     JointParameters() {}
00051     JointParameters(JointType type, Real alpha, Real a, Real d, Real theta,
00052                     Real minLimit, Real MaxLimit, Real minAccel=0, Real maxAccel=0,
00053                     bool active=true)
00054       : type(type), alpha(alpha), a(a), d(d), theta(theta),
00055         minLimit(minLimit), maxLimit(maxLimit), minAccel(minAccel), maxAccel(maxAccel),
00056         active(active)
00057       {}
00058 
00059     JointType type;
00060 
00061     // Denavit-Hartenberg 
00062     Real alpha;  
00063     Real a;      
00064     Real d;      
00065     Real theta;  
00066 
00067     Real minLimit, maxLimit; 
00068     Real minAccel, maxAccel; 
00069     
00070     bool active; 
00071     
00072     Int actuatorIndex; 
00073     // (e.g. if Revolute, then actuatorIndex is index of theta variable)
00074 
00075     bool operator==(const JointParameters& p)
00076     { return (type==p.type)
00077         && base::equals(alpha,p.alpha) && base::equals(theta,p.theta)
00078         && base::equals(d,p.d) && base::equals(a,p.a)
00079         && base::equals(minLimit,p.minLimit) && base::equals(maxLimit,p.maxLimit)
00080         && base::equals(minAccel,p.minAccel) && base::equals(maxAccel,p.maxAccel)
00081         && (active==p.active) 
00082         && (actuatorIndex==p.actuatorIndex);
00084     }
00085 
00086     bool operator!=(const JointParameters& p) { return !(*this == p); }
00087 
00088   };
00089 
00090   // Parameters describing complete manipulator
00091   typedef base::array<JointParameters> Parameters;
00092 
00093   virtual const Parameters& getParameters() const = 0; 
00094 
00095 protected:
00096   SerialManipulator() {}
00097   SerialManipulator(const SerialManipulator& sm) : Manipulator(sm) {}
00098   SerialManipulator(String name) : Manipulator(name) {}
00099 
00100 };
00101 
00102 
00103 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const robot::SerialManipulator& m) // Output
00104 {
00105   out << "D-H parameters for each joint: (* marks variable)\n";
00106   const robot::SerialManipulator::Parameters& p = m.getParameters();
00107 
00108   using base::radToDeg;
00109 
00110   for(Int i=0; i<p.size(); i++) {
00111     const robot::SerialManipulator::JointParameters& j(p[i]);
00112     out << i << " - ";
00113 
00114     switch(j.type){
00115     case SerialManipulator::JointParameters::Revolute:  
00116       out << "Revolute :" << " alpha:" << radToDeg(j.alpha) << ",  a:" << j.a << ",  d:" << j.d << ",  *theta:"  << radToDeg(j.theta) << "\n"; 
00117       break;
00118     case SerialManipulator::JointParameters::Prismatic:  
00119       out << "Prismatic:" << " alpha:" << radToDeg(j.alpha) << ",  a:" << j.a << ",  *d:" << j.d << ",  theta:"  << radToDeg(j.theta) << "\n";
00120       break;
00121     }
00122   }
00123   return out;
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 } // robot
00128 
00129 #endif
